architecture

üîó RDF Properties

Attribute Value
rdf:type skos:Concept, skos:Concept, skos:Concept, skos:Concept
skos:inScheme http://usmba.ai/terms
skos:topConceptOf http://usmba.ai/terms
http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label architecture
skos:prefLabel Architecture, Business Architecture, Enterprise Architecture, Requirements Architecture
skos:definition The design, structure, and behaviour of the current and future states of a structure in terms of its components, and the interaction between those components. See also business architecture, enterprise architecture, and requirements architecture., The design and structure of business processes, capabilities, and organizational elements., A comprehensive framework for managing and aligning business processes, information systems, and technology infrastructure., The structure and organization of requirements for a system or project.
skos:scopeNote Use this concept to describe the overall structure, design, and interaction of system components, particularly in IT and business analysis contexts. It serves as a general term encompassing more specific forms such as business architecture, enterprise architecture, and requirements architecture, each of which can be modeled as a narrower concept.
skos:narrower :#businessArchitecture, :#enterpriseArchitecture, :#requirementsArchitecture

  skos:prefLabel "Architecture"@en ;
